about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Dollex Agrotech Limited is engaged in the business of manufacturing & trading sugar with captive power cogeneration capabilities.

The company also produce and sells its by-products such as mollases, pressed and bagasse. The bagasse is used to generate power. Further, the company is engaged in power generation up to the captive power of 3 MW.

Dollex Agrotech Limited has achieved a turnover of Rs. 7,940.11 Lakhs and a Profit after tax of Rs. 326.90 Lakhs in the Financial year 2021-2022.

The company's product portfolio includes Jaggery powder, Sugar, Molasses, Bagasse, Press mud, and Pharma-grade Sugar.

The company have booked a space through an agreement dated 25-12-2021 with a Warehousing facility for storing our sugar stocks with Star Agriwarehousing & Collateral Management Limited, situated at Khasra No. 421/1, Village Govindpur, Datia, Badoni, Madhya Pradesh for a quantity of 2000MT.

The company have been allotted an area of 7600 sq. ft by the government to take the sugarcane produce from the farmers. The company offer sufficient incentives and assistance in various stages of cultivation, thus ensuring loyalty from these farmers.

faqs.question: What is the Dollex Agrotech IPO?
faqs.answer:
Dollex Agrotech IPO is a SME IPO of 6968000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹24.39 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹35 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on December 15, 2022, and closes on December 20, 2022.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Dollex Agrotech IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Dollex Agrotech IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Dollex Agrotech IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Dollex Agrotech IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Dollex Agrotech IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Dollex Agrotech IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Dollex Agrotech IPO opens on December 15, 2022 and closes on December 20, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Dollex Agrotech IPO?
faqs.answer: Dollex Agrotech IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,40,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Dollex Agrotech IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Dollex Agrotech IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Dollex Agrotech IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Dollex Agrotech IPO will be done on Friday, December 23, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, December 27, 2022. Check the Dollex Agrotech IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Dollex Agrotech IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Dollex Agrotech IPO listing date is on Wednesday, December 28, 2022.
